questions.question: কবি কাজী নজরুল ইসলামের প্রথম প্রকাশিত লেখা কোনটি?
questions.explanation: কাজী নজরুল ইসলামের প্রথম প্রকাশিত গ্রন্থ: গ্রন্থ ধরন রচয়িতা বাউন্ডেলের আত্মকাহিনী গল্প কাজী নজরুল ইসলাম মুক্তি কবিতা কাজী নজরুল ইসলাম বাঁধনহারা উপন্যাস কাজী নজরুল ইসলাম অগ্নি-বীণা কাব্য কাজী নজরুল ইসলাম তুর্কমহিলার ঘোমটা খোলা প্রবন্ধ কাজী নজরুল ইসলাম ঝিলিমিলি নাটক কাজী নজরুল ইসলাম

questions.question: 'ত্রিভুজ' কোন সমাস?
questions.explanation: যে সমাসে সংখ্যাবাচক শব্দ পূর্বে বসে সমাহার বোঝায় তাকে দ্বিগু সমাস বলে। যেমন: তিন ভুজের সমাহার= ত্রিভুজ, নব রত্নের সমাহার = নবরত্ন।

questions.question: 'অজমূর্খ শব্দে 'অজ' কোন জাত উপসর্গ?
questions.explanation: বাংলা উপসর্গ ২১টি। যথা: অ, অঘা, অজ, অনা, আ, আড়, আন, আব, ইতি, উন, কদ, কু, নি, পাতি, বি, ভর, রাম, স, সা, সু, হা।

questions.question: কোনটি 'নিরাময়' শব্দের সন্ধিবিচ্ছেদ?
questions.explanation: গুরুত্বপূর্ণ বিসর্গ সন্ধি নিঃ + আকার = নিরাকার, আশীঃ + বাদ = আশীর্বাদ, দুঃ + যোগ =দুর্যোগ, নিঃ+ আশা= নিরাশা, অতঃ + এব = অতএব।

questions.question: 'কাকনিন্দ্রা' বাগ্ধারাটির অর্থ কী?
questions.explanation: কতিপয় বাগধারা: কাক ভূষণ্ডি (সম্পূর্ণ ভেজা), ভূষণ্ডির কাক (দীর্ঘজীবী), কাকস্নান (অসম্পূর্ণ গোসল), কালে ভদ্রে (কদাচিৎ), কিষ্কিন্ধ্যাকাণ্ড (তুমুল হট্টগোল)।

questions.question: "I eat rice"- Which one of the following specifies the passive form of the sentence?
questions.explanation: বাক্যটির passive হবে Rice is eaten by me.

questions.question: "Man is mortal" he told me, Which one of the following specifies the indirect form of the sentence?

options.label: ক
options.text: Man is mortal was told to me

options.label: খ
options.text: He told me man is mortal

options.label: গ
options.text: He told me that man was mortal

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He told me that man is mortal

questions.option_a: Man is mortal was told to me
questions.option_b: He told me man is mortal
questions.option_c: He told me that man was mortal
questions.option_d: He told me that man is mortal
questions.explanation: Man is mortal দ্বারা চিরন্তন সত্য বোঝানোর কারনে indirect করার সময় tense এর কোনো পরিবর্তন হবে না।

questions.question: "Honey tastes sweet"- Which one of the following specifies the passive form of the sentence?

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Honey is sweet when it is tasted.

questions.option_d: Honey is sweet when it is tasted.
questions.explanation: Select the SIMILAR to CA PITALIZED word

questions.question: CIRCUMSPECT:
questions.explanation: Circumspect শব্দটির অর্থ সতর্ক বা বিচক্ষণ (prudent)।

questions.question: synonym of DEMURE:
questions.explanation: Demure শব্দটির অর্থ বিনয়ী বা ভদ্র (modest)। Correct answer: গ modest Reason: Demure means modest, shy, or reserved in behavior. The other options (destroy, accuse, release) are unrelated in meaning.

questions.question: BANAL:
questions.explanation: Banal অর্থ গতানুগতিক, মামুলি, তুচ্ছ। এর বিপরীত। original, sharp, conspicuous, intelligent, fresh ইত্যাদি।

questions.question: Antonym of SABOTAGE:
questions.explanation: Sabotage অর্থ ইচ্ছাপূর্বক কোনো কিছুর ক্ষতি সাধন করা বা অন্তর্ঘাত, এর বিপরীত হবে সম্পূর্ণ করা বা সাহায্য করা।Analogy

questions.question: MEDICINE: ILLNESS:
questions.explanation: Medicine দ্বারা রোগ বা illness (অসুস্থতা) দূর করা যায়। আর Law আইন প্রয়োগ করে anarchy (অরাজতা) দূর করা যায়।

questions.question: PEPPER:BERRY:
CLOCK:TIME:
questions.explanation: Clock হচ্ছে time দেখার যন্ত্র, অপরদিকে yardstick দ্বারা distance মানা যায়।

questions.question: Replace the underlined sentence and select the correct words to correct the sentence Although some of the aspects of his talk have global application.
questions.explanation: This sentence is incorrect because: “Although” introduces a subordinate clause. With “some of the aspects” , the sentence remains incomplete and awkward for correction. The correct and standard correction is to change it to: Although one of the aspects of his talk has global application. Here: “one of the aspects” is singular Verb “has” correctly agrees So the correct replacement is “one of the” . Correct answer: ক) one of the One of the aspects অর্থ তার বক্তব্যের অন্যতম দিক। তার মানে, তার কথায় বৈশ্বিক আবেদন রয়েছে।

questions.question: For each underlined word, select the correct word to correct the sentence. We cannot belive that he is the man whose saved you from drowning.
questions.explanation: বাক্যের মাঝে relative pronoun হিসেবে who + verb/ whom + subject এই নিয়ম ব্যবহার করতে হয়।

questions.question: While there is ——— single newspaper with a large national circulation, many magazines have national circulation.
questions.explanation: No single newspaper= একটিও সংবাদপত্র নেই। তার মানে, যদিও ব্যাপক পরিসরে জাতীয় প্রচার সমৃদ্ধ একটি পত্রিকাও নাই, তথাপি অনেক ম্যাগাজিনের রয়েছে জাতীয় প্রচার।

questions.question: My friend believes that research is a group effort and—-- do I.
questions.explanation: এখানে so do I =I also believe। তার মানে, আমার বন্ধু বিশ্বাস করে যে গবেষণা একটি দলগত প্রচেষ্টা এবং আমিও তাই বিশ্বাস করি।

questions.question: My cousins live —-- a farm.
If we——- salt, the soup would have been tastier.
Travelers check is useful when one is traveling because - people vetoes to accept this.

The eyes of a human being are not sensitive to all light but only that between wavelengths of 380-760 Millimicrons. This fact prevents us from being aware that our bodies emit electromagnetic waves. These waves are mostly longer than that we are sensitive to but thermo graphic techniques can translate them into extraordinary colored pictures. Atoms generate infrared rays since they are constantly in motion. The warmer the atoms are the more active they become. This results thermo graphic pictures revealing different parts of the body in different colors: blacks and blue for the cold parts, green, yellow for the cool or slightly, warms ones and orange and red for those which are hot. All this has health applications for such problems as tumors, arthritis and cancer, which show up as isolated red areas on the thermo graphic portraits. According to the passage,

options.label: ক
options.text: the eyes of human being are not all sensitive to light

options.label: খ
options.text: Some people's bodies emit electro magnetic waves

options.label: গ
options.text: some light can not be seen by human eye

options.label: ঘ
options.text: light wavelengths vary between 380 and 760 mill-microns.

questions.option_a: the eyes of human being are not all sensitive to light
questions.option_b: Some people's bodies emit electro magnetic waves
questions.option_c: some light can not be seen by human eye
questions.option_d: light wavelengths vary between 380 and 760 mill-microns.

The eyes of a human being are not sensitive to all light but only that between wavelengths of 380-760 Millimicrons. This fact prevents us from being aware that our bodies emit electromagnetic waves. These waves are mostly longer than that we are sensitive to but thermo graphic techniques can translate them into extraordinary colored pictures. Atoms generate infrared rays since they are constantly in motion. The warmer the atoms are the more active they become. This results thermo graphic pictures revealing different parts of the body in different colors: blacks and blue for the cold parts, green, yellow for the cool or slightly, warms ones and orange and red for those which are hot. All this has health applications for such problems as tumors, arthritis and cancer, which show up as isolated red areas on the thermo graphic portraits. The atoms to tumors or cancerous areas are
questions.explanation: Correct answer: গ) very active ✅ Why: The passage explains: “Atoms generate infrared rays since they are constantly in motion. The warmer the atoms are the more active they become. This results in thermographic pictures revealing different parts of the body in different colors … red for those which are hot … tumors, arthritis and cancer … show up as isolated red areas …” Tumors or cancerous areas show up as red , which indicates that the atoms there are hotter and therefore very active . ✔ So the key characteristic of the atoms in tumors/cancerous areas is that they are very active .

questions.question: For each underlined word, select the correct word to correct the sentence. Of all the possible disasters that threaten Bangladesh agriculture, the possibility of an adverse change in climate is may be the more difficult for analysis.

options.label: ক

options.label: গ

questions.option_b: is probably the more difficult for analysis
questions.option_c: is it may be analysis that is most diffieult
questions.option_d: is probably the most difficult for analysis
questions.explanation: Disasters তো দুইটা নয়, অনেকগুলি, তাই the most difficult হবে। তার মানে, বাংলাদেশের কৃষির জন্য হুমকিস্বরূপ সকল সম্ভাব্য প্রাকৃতিক দূর্যোগের মধ্যে জলবায়ুর বিরূপ পরিবর্তনের সম্ভাবনা বিশ্লেষণ করা সম্ভবত সবচেয়ে কঠিন।

questions.question: For each underlined word, select the correct word to correct the sentence. Balding is much more common among white males than males of other races.

options.label: ক
options.text: than among males of other races.

options.label: গ
options.text: than it among males of other races.

questions.option_a: than among males of other races.
questions.option_c: than it among males of other races.
questions.explanation: More comon among X than among Y। তার মানে, টেকো হওয়ার ঘটনাটা অন্যান্য race এর male দের চেয়ে white দের মধ্যে বেশি কমন।

questions.question: For each underlined word, select the correct word to correct the sentence. The differences of opinion among the juries have resulted in the acquittal of the criminal.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: has been resulted in the acquittal

questions.option_d: has been resulted in the acquittal
questions.explanation: Differences হলো বহুবচন, তাই have resulted in হবে। অর্থ: জুরিদের মধ্যে মতামতের ভিন্নতা অপরাধীর বেকসুর খালাস হয়েছে।

questions.question: If we——- salt, the soup would have been tastier.
questions.explanation: The correct option is: ক) added Explanation: The sentence is a third conditional (past unreal situation), which follows the structure: If + past perfect, would have + past participle Here: “If we added salt, the soup would have been tastier.” Other options like "could add" or "don't add" do not fit the past unreal conditional.

questions.question: The art of landscape architecture is———-that of architecture itself.
questions.explanation: As old এর সাথে as হবে। তার মানে, প্রাকৃতিক ভূ-দৃশ্য সম্বলিত স্থাপত্যটির নকশা স্থাপত্যটির এর নিজস্ব নকশার মতো প্রায় পুরাতন।

questions.question: Travelers checks are useful when one is travelling because——— people get advantages by using them during travelling.
questions.explanation: অনেক লোক ব্যবহার করার কারণেই ভ্রমণের সময় Travelers checks উপকারী।

questions.question: Blind fish that spend their entire life in caves ____ have eyes nor ears.
questions.explanation: Neither এর সাথে nor হবে। যে সকল অন্ধ মাছ তাদের পুরো জীবন গুহাতে কাটায় তাদের চোখও নাই, কানও নাই।

questions.question: What is the currency name of South Africa?
A company managed from one home country and in business in several countries is known as-
questions.explanation: Multinational Company একটি দেশে গঠিত হলেও এর কার্যক্রম বিভিন্ন দেশে পরিচালিত হয়।

questions.question: The head office of New Development (BRICS) Bank is situated in-
questions.explanation: Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa নিয়ে ২০০৬ সালে BRICS গঠিত হয়। এই দেশগুলো একটি নতুন ব্যাংক স্থাপন করে যার নাম New Development Bank। ব্যাংকের সদর দপ্তর চীনের সাংহাইতে অবস্থিত।

questions.question: The economy where goods and services were exchanged directly to each other is known as-
questions.explanation: Barter economy তে পণ্যের/সেবার বিনিময়ে পণ্য/সেবা বিনিময় হয়।

questions.question: The account that is required to apply for using new stocks from IPO is known as-
questions.explanation: BO (Beneficiary Owner) Account হলো এমন একটি Account যা IPO (Initial Public Offerings) তে নতুন স্টক ক্রয়ের আবেদনে প্রয়োজন হয়।

questions.question: The term ATM stands for what?
When the volume of import is higher than export then this situation is know as.
Who is the current Governor of Bangladesh Bank?
questions.explanation: বর্তমান বাংলাদেশ ব্যাংকের গভর্নর আব্দুর রফউ তালুকদার (১২তম)।

questions.question: Which of the following is the major stock market index in Germany?
Bangladesh Budget 2014-15 is aimed to achieve what percentage of GDP growth?
questions.explanation: FY 2022-23 GDP growth rate 7.5%.

questions.question: How many years does steven need to invest his $ 3 , 000 \$ 3,000 $3 , 000 at 7% to earn $ 210 \$ 210 $210 in simple interest?
questions.explanation: n = I × 100 p r = 210 × 100 3000 × 7 = 1 \mathrm{n}=\frac{\mathrm{I} \times 100}{\mathrm{pr}}=\frac{210 \times 100}{3000 \times 7}=1 n = pr I × 100 ​ = 3000 × 7 210 × 100 ​ = 1 years

questions.question: After having to pay increased income taxes this year, Edmond has to sell his BMW. Edmond thought the car for $ 49 , 000 \mathbf{\$ 4 9 , 0 0 0} $49 , 000 , but he sold it for a 20 % \mathbf{2 0 \%} 20% loss. What did Edmond sell the car for?
If the perimeter of a rectangular house is 44 yards, and the length is 36 \mathbf{3 6} 36 feet, what is the width of the house?
questions.explanation: 44 yards = 44 × 3 = 132 =44 \times 3=132 = 44 × 3 = 132 feet According to question, 2 ( 36 + 2(36+ 2 ( 36 + width ) = 132 )=132 ) = 132 ⇒ 36 + \Rightarrow 36+ ⇒ 36 + width = 66 ∴ =66 \therefore = 66 ∴ width = 30 =30 = 30 feet

questions.question: What is the cost in dollars to steam clean a room W yards wide and L L L yards long if the steam cleaners charge 10 cents per square foot?
Sum of three consecutive whole numbers is 45 , then what is one-third of the middle number?
questions.explanation: three consecutive whole numbers is x , x + 1 x, x+1 x , x + 1 , x + 2 x+2 x + 2 According to question, x + x + 1 + x + 2 = 45 ⇒ 3 x = 42 ∴ x = 14 x+x+1+x+2=45 \Rightarrow 3 x=42 \therefore x=14 x + x + 1 + x + 2 = 45 ⇒ 3 x = 42 ∴ x = 14 ∴ \therefore ∴ Three consecutive numbers are 14 , 15 , 16 14,15,16 14 , 15 , 16 ∴ \therefore ∴ Number = 15 =15 = 15 of 1 3 = 5 \frac{1}{3}=5 3 1 ​ = 5

A driver is issued a b b b ench warrant for $ 2 , 29.25 \$ 2,29.25 $2 , 29.25 which includes a 15 % 15 \% 15% fee for late charges and court costs. How many tickets has the driver not paid?

it x + y < 10 x+y<10 x + y < 10 , and x − y > 12 x-y>12 x − y > 12 , which of the following pairs could be the values of x x x and y y y ?

A business is owned by 9 women and 1 man, each of whom owns an equal share. If one of the women sells 1 2 \frac{1}{2} 2 1 ​ of her share to the man and another woman keeps 1 5 \frac{1}{5} 5 1 ​ of her share and sells the rest to the man, what fraction of the business will the man own?

A circular frame with a width of 2 inches surrounds a circular photo with a diameter of 8 inches. Assuming that the area of the frame does not overlap the area of the photo, what is the area of the frame?
questions.explanation: According to question The area of the frame = ( 2 + 4 ) 2 π − ( 4 ) 2 π = 36 π − 16 π = 20 π =(2+4)^{2} \pi-(4)^{2} \pi=36 \pi-16 \pi=20 \pi = ( 2 + 4 ) 2 π − ( 4 ) 2 π = 36 π − 16 π = 20 π

questions.question: If 6 x − 3 y = 30 6 x-3 y=30 6 x − 3 y = 30 and 4 x = 2 − y 4 x=2-y 4 x = 2 − y then find x + y x+y x + y .
questions.explanation: 6 x − 3 y = 30 … . ( i ) 4 x + y = 2 … . . ( i i ) \begin{array}{l} 6 x-3 y=30….(i) \\ 4 x+y=2 …..(ii) \end{array} 6 x − 3 y = 30 … . ( i ) 4 x + y = 2 … .. ( ii ) ​  (i)  +  (ii)  × 3 , we get,  6 x − 3 y = 30 12 x + 3 y = 6 18 x = 36 ∴ x = 2 \begin{array}{l} \text { (i) }+ \text { (ii) } \times 3 \text {, we get, } \\ 6 x-3 y=30 \\ \frac{12 x+3 y=6}{18 x}=36 \therefore x=2 \end{array}  (i)  +  (ii)  × 3 , we get,  6 x − 3 y = 30 18 x 12 x + 3 y = 6 ​ = 36 ∴ x = 2 ​ putting the value of x x x in equation (ii) we get, y = 2 − 8 = − 6 ∴ x + y = 2 − 6 = − 4 y=2-8=-6 \quad \therefore x+y=2-6=-4 y = 2 − 8 = − 6 ∴ x + y = 2 − 6 = − 4

questions.question: Jim can fill a pool carrying buckets of water in 30 minutes. Sue can do the same job in 45 \mathbf{4 5} 45 minutes. Tony can do the same job in 1 1 2 1 \frac{1}{2} 1 2 1 ​ hours. How quickly can all three fill the pool together?

What is 35% of a number if 12 is 15% of a number?
questions.explanation: Let, the number be x x x 12 = 15 %  of  x ⇒ x = 12 × 100 15 ∴ x = 80 ∴ 35 %  of  80 = 35 100 × 80 = 28 \begin{array}{l} 12=15 \% \text { of } \mathrm{x} \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\frac{12 \times 100}{15} \therefore \mathrm{x}=80 \\ \therefore 35 \% \text { of } 80=\frac{35}{100} \times 80=28 \end{array} 12 = 15%  of  x ⇒ x = 15 12 × 100 ​ ∴ x = 80 ∴ 35%  of  80 = 100 35 ​ × 80 = 28 ​

Six years ago Anita was P times as old as Ben was. If Anita is now 17 years old, how old is Ben now in terms of p p p ?
questions.explanation: Let, six years ago, the age of Ben was X X X years six years ago, the age of Anita was PX years The present age of Ben is ( X + 6 ) (X+6) ( X + 6 ) years The present age of Anita is ( P X + 6 ) (\mathrm{PX}+6) ( PX + 6 ) years According to question, P X + 6 = 17 ⇒ P X = 11 ∴ X = 11 P \mathrm{PX}+6=17 \Rightarrow \mathrm{PX}=11 \therefore \mathrm{X}=\frac{11}{\mathrm{P}} PX + 6 = 17 ⇒ PX = 11 ∴ X = P 11 ​ ∴ \therefore ∴ The present age of B B B en is ( 11 P + 6 ) \left(\frac{11}{P}+6\right) ( P 11 ​ + 6 ) years

Lee worked 22 hours this week and made $ 132 \$ 132 $132 . If she works 15 hours next week at the same pay rate, how much will she makes?
questions.explanation: Working 22 hours per week one gets $ 132 \$ 132 $132 Working 1 hours per week one gets $ 132 22 = $ 6 \$ \frac{132}{22}=\$ 6 $ 22 132 ​ = $6 ∴ \therefore ∴ She gets ( $ 15 × 6 ) = $ 90 (\$ 15 \times 6)=\$ 90 ( $15 × 6 ) = $90

questions.question: If 8 x + 5 x + 2 x + 4 x = 114 8 x+5 x+2 x+4 x=114 8 x + 5 x + 2 x + 4 x = 114 , then 5 x + 3 = 5 x+3= 5 x + 3 = ?
questions.explanation: 19x=114 ∴ x = 6 \therefore \mathrm{x}=6 ∴ x = 6 ∴ 5 x + 3 = 5 × 6 × 3 = 33 \therefore 5 x+3=5 \times 6 \times 3=33 ∴ 5 x + 3 = 5 × 6 × 3 = 33

questions.question: Your supervisor instructs you to purchase 240 pens and 6 staplers for the nurse's station. Pens are purchased in sets of 6 for $ 2.35 \$ 2.35 $2.35 per pack. Staplers are sold in sets of 2 for $ 12.95 \$ 12.95 $12.95 . How much will purchasing these products cost?
